name: Daisy Chain Descent
description:
You're on top of a group of floating islands that suddenly start to fall, you need to collect enough daisies to make a chain and escape before it's too late!

This game was made by Elliot and Vic in 48 hours for the Climax Game Jam. The theme for the game jam was 'Chain'.

Third Party Assets:

Summer Day Out

https://www.playonloop.com/2017-music-loops/summer-day-out/

Bits and Beats

https://www.playonloop.com/2017-music-loops/bits-and-beats/
